metadata.name: sovereign_liquidity
metadata.description: Sovereign Liquidity Protocol - Fair launch with recovery-first LP and Genesis NFT fee rights

instructions.name: accept_authority_transfer
docs: Accept protocol authority transfer (step 2 of 2)

instructions.name: activate_position
docs: Activate position_bps on a DepositRecord (permissionless).
Must be called after bonding completes before governance or claims.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank this — permissionless

instructions.name: admin_sweep_vault
docs: Admin sweep — transfer remaining sol_vault balance to treasury.
Use after all investor/creator obligations are cleared.
Protocol authority only. Sovereign must be Halted, Unwound, or Retired.

instructions.name: burn_nft_into_position
docs: Burn a Genesis NFT back into a deposit record.
Dissolves the NftPosition backing into the caller's DR.
Creates a new DR if the caller has none (init_if_needed).

accounts.name: deposit_record
docs: Holder's deposit record — init_if_needed for secondary buyers

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: NFT mint being burned

accounts.name: nft_token_account
docs: Holder's NFT token account (must hold exactly 1)

accounts.name: nft_position
docs: NftPosition being dissolved — closed after data is absorbed by DR

instructions.name: buy_nft
docs: Buy a listed Genesis NFT. Full price to seller (no royalty).
NFT transferred from escrow to buyer.

accounts.name: buyer
docs: Buyer paying for the NFT

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT being bought

accounts.name: escrow_nft_account
docs: Escrow: sovereign PDA's ATA holding the listed NFT

accounts.name: buyer_nft_account
docs: Buyer's NFT token account (will receive the NFT)

accounts.name: nft_listing
docs: The listing being purchased — closed after sale (rent → seller)

instructions.name: claim_creator_unwind
docs: Creator reclaims tokens and surplus GOR after unwind.
BYO: returns all tokens + surplus GOR above investor principal.
TokenLaunch: returns unsold tokens (surplus goes to token holders instead).

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Source of surplus GOR returned to creator after governance unwind.
Funds flow only to `creator` (validated by has_one on sovereign) — no arbitrary withdrawal.

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault — holds unsold/returned tokens

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint — for transfer_checked (mut: set_transfer_fee writes to mint)

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator's token account — receives returned tokens

instructions.name: claim_pool_lp_fees
docs: Claim LP fees (NFT holder). Verifies NFT, then CPIs to engine program.

accounts.name: holder
docs: DR owner (must be the original depositor)

accounts.name: original_depositor
docs: and engine CPI depositor key. Must equal holder (only DR owner can claim).

accounts.name: deposit_record
docs: The investor's deposit record — LP fees are proportional to DR amount.
No NFT required; minting NFTs reduces DR, reducing fee share.

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: Engine pool (owned by engine program)

accounts.name: lp_claim
docs: LP claim record (owned by engine program, init_if_needed)

accounts.name: engine_gor_vault
docs: Engine pool GOR vault

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine program

accounts.name: protocol_state
docs: Protocol state — needed to read default_swap_fee_bps if transition fires

instructions.name: claim_transfer_fees
docs: Creator claims accumulated transfer fee tokens from the vault.
Optionally harvests withheld fees from remaining_accounts first.
No cap, no state gate — creator can claim anytime.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint — needed for decimals + harvest

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault — source of accumulated transfer fee tokens.
Authority = sovereign PDA.

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator's token account — destination for claimed tokens

instructions.name: claim_unwind
docs: Claim proceeds from unwound sovereign

accounts.name: holder
docs: Claimer — claims from their deposit record

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Funds flow only to `holder` under Unwound state guard.

instructions.name: close_sovereign
docs: Close a sovereign and all its vaults permanently.
Sweeps remaining SOL to treasury, burns tokens, recovers rent.
Works with old/outdated account layouts (raw byte parsing).
Pass remaining_accounts to close DRs, NftPositions, NftListings in batches.
Protocol authority only. Sovereign must be Retired.

accounts.name: sovereign
docs: because old sovereign accounts may not match current struct layout.

instructions.name: close_vote_record
docs: Close a finalized VoteRecord account and return rent to the original voter.
Protocol authority only. Proposal must be in Passed or Failed state.

instructions.name: create_sovereign
docs: Create a new sovereign (token launch or BYO token)

accounts.name: protocol_state
docs: Use Box to reduce stack usage - ProtocolState is a large account

accounts.name: sovereign
docs: Sovereign PDA — seeded with `sovereign_count + 1` to match the ID assigned
in the handler after incrementing. This is safe because Solana executes
transactions sequentially within a slot: the PDA init and the count increment
are atomic within this single transaction.

accounts.name: creator_tracker
docs: Use Box to reduce stack usage

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Validated against the hardcoded TREASURY constant.

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Refunded to creator on failed bond, sent to treasury on successful finalize.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint - for BYO this is the existing token (SPL Token or Token-2022)
For TokenLaunch this will be created in a separate instruction

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator's token account (for BYO token transfer)

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Sovereign's token vault

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program - SPL Token or Token-2022 (for BYO compatibility)

instructions.name: create_token
docs: Create Token-2022 mint for a TokenLaunch sovereign
Must be called after create_sovereign for TokenLaunch types

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint PDA - derived from sovereign

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault to hold initial supply - created manually after mint init

accounts.name: token_program_2022
docs: Token-2022 program

instructions.name: delist_nft
docs: Remove an NFT listing. Callable by seller or protocol authority.
NFT returned from escrow to seller.

accounts.name: caller
docs: Caller — seller or protocol authority

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint

accounts.name: escrow_nft_account
docs: Escrow: sovereign PDA's ATA holding the listed NFT

accounts.name: seller_nft_account
docs: Seller's ATA — NFT returned here

accounts.name: nft_listing
docs: The listing being removed

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit SOL during bonding phase

accounts.name: deposit_record
docs: Deposit record - initialized if new depositor

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: SOL vault to hold deposits during bonding

instructions.name: emergency_drain_engine
docs: Emergency drain engine pool — CPIs to engine drain_pool from Halted state.
Protocol authority only. Use for Recovery/Active sovereigns where GOR is in engine vaults.

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: Engine pool (owned by engine program)

accounts.name: engine_gor_vault
docs: Engine pool GOR vault

accounts.name: engine_token_vault
docs: Engine pool token vault

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Sovereign's SOL vault (receives drained GOR)

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Sovereign's token vault (receives unsold tokens)

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine-v3 program

instructions.name: emergency_token_redemption
docs: Emergency token redemption - external token holders burn sovereign tokens
to receive proportional share of surplus GOR from the LP unwind.
Available when token_redemption_pool > 0 (unwind_sol_balance > total_deposited).

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint — needed for transfer_checked (reads decimals)

accounts.name: caller_token_account
docs: Caller's token account — tokens will be transferred to creator

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator's token account — receives the redeemed tokens instead of burning

instructions.name: emergency_unlock
docs: Emergency unlock - transitions sovereign to Halted state
Callable by protocol authority or sovereign creator from ANY state

instructions.name: emergency_withdraw
docs: Emergency withdraw for investors - reclaim deposited GOR
DR-only: position_bps determines proportional share (burn NFTs into DR first)

accounts.name: holder
docs: Depositor or DR holder (may have burned NFTs into this DR)

instructions.name: emergency_withdraw_creator
docs: Emergency withdraw for creator - reclaim escrow and creation fee

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Must be writable. Address validated in handler.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program — must be SPL Token or Token-2022

instructions.name: execute_engine_unwind
docs: Execute engine pool unwind — drain pool vaults via CPI, take protocol fee.
Called after governance unwind vote passes and observation period elapses.

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: Engine pool (owned by engine program, read for volume check)

accounts.name: engine_gor_vault
docs: Engine pool GOR vault

accounts.name: engine_token_vault
docs: Engine pool token vault

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Sovereign's SOL vault (receives drained GOR for investor claims)
Receives GOR drained from the engine pool. Funds flow only to NFT holders
via claim_unwind after protocol fee deduction — no arbitrary withdrawal possible.

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Sovereign's token vault (receives unsold tokens)

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine-v3 program

instructions.name: expire_listing
docs: Expire a stale NFT listing. Permissionless crank.
Returns NFT to seller when listing has passed its expires_at timestamp
OR when the sovereign enters a terminal state (Unwound/Halted/Failed).
Closes the escrow ATA and listing PDA, returning all rent to the seller.

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can crank this — no signer requirement beyond paying tx fee

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint

accounts.name: escrow_nft_account
docs: Escrow holding the listed NFT

accounts.name: seller_nft_account
docs: Seller's ATA — NFT returned here (init_if_needed, payer = caller)

accounts.name: nft_listing
docs: Listing being expired — closed, rent to seller

instructions.name: finalize_engine_pool
docs: Finalize sovereign: Create engine pool via CPI to sovereign-engine program.
Called after bond target is met (state = Finalizing).
Transfers GOR + tokens to engine vaults, creates pool, optional creator buy-in.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: The sovereign's token mint (mut: set_transfer_fee writes to mint)

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: The bonding SOL vault (holds deposited GOR from investors)
Holds investor deposits. Funds are transferred to the engine GOR vault in Step 1
of finalize_engine_pool — only to the canonical engine_gor_vault PDA.

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: The token vault (holds sovereign tokens deposited by creator)

accounts.name: engine_gor_vault
docs: The engine pool's GOR vault (native SOL PDA — derived under engine program)

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: The engine pool account (will be initialized by engine program via CPI)

accounts.name: engine_token_vault
docs: The engine pool's token vault (will be initialized by engine program via CPI)

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Optional: Creator's token ATA (receives tokens from creator buy-in).
Only used if sovereign.creator_escrow > 0.

accounts.name: bin_array
docs: BinArray page 0 (will be initialized by engine program via CPI)

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine-v3 program

instructions.name: finalize_vote
docs: Finalize voting after period ends.
If passed, snapshots engine pool fee counters and starts observation period.
remaining_accounts[0] = engine_pool (required when vote passes, for fee snapshot)

instructions.name: force_close_proposal
docs: Force-close a broken or stuck proposal account.
Clears the sovereign's has_active_proposal flag and returns rent.
Protocol authority only.
NOTE: Rent is returned to protocol authority (not original proposer).

accounts.name: proposal
docs: Proposal layout changed (e.g. old account missing voting_starts_at).
Rent is returned to the authority.

instructions.name: force_close_vote_record
docs: Force-close a VoteRecord regardless of proposal status.
Used to clean up orphaned vote records after force_close_proposal.
Rent returned to original voter. Protocol authority only.

accounts.name: proposal
docs: The proposal this vote record belongs to.
Can be in any state (Active, Passed, Failed, etc.)
Validated as a program-owned account via constraint.

instructions.name: initialize_collection
docs: Initialize the protocol-wide Genesis NFT collection.
One-time setup — creates a Metaplex verified collection mint
so all Genesis NFTs are grouped on marketplaces.

accounts.name: collection_mint
docs: Collection NFT mint — one per protocol, PDA-derived.

accounts.name: collection_token_account
docs: Token account to hold the single collection NFT.

instructions.name: initialize_protocol
docs: Initialize the protocol state (one-time setup)

instructions.name: list_nft
docs: List a Genesis NFT for sale on the protocol marketplace (escrow-based).
NFT transferred to sovereign PDA escrow. Price in SOL (lamports).
Optionally set an expiry timestamp (expires_at = 0 means no expiry).

accounts.name: seller
docs: NFT holder listing the NFT

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint being listed

accounts.name: nft_token_account
docs: Seller's NFT token account (holds the NFT)

accounts.name: escrow_nft_account
docs: Escrow: sovereign PDA's ATA for this NFT mint (init if needed)

accounts.name: nft_position
docs: NftPosition — validates this NFT is a real sovereign position

accounts.name: nft_listing
docs: NftListing PDA — created here

instructions.name: mark_bonding_failed
docs: Mark bonding as failed if deadline passed

instructions.name: mint_nft_from_position
docs: Mint an NFT from a deposit record (reservoir model).
Carves `amount` of SOL backing and mints a freely-tradeable Genesis NFT.
Fee is charged on top of `amount` from the minter's wallet.

accounts.name: holder
docs: Depositor minting an NFT from their deposit record

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Treasury receives the mint fee

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: New NFT mint PDA — seeded by sovereign + nft_counter.
No freeze authority — NFT is freely tradeable.

accounts.name: nft_token_account
docs: Holder's ATA for the new NFT

accounts.name: nft_position
docs: NftPosition PDA — keyed by nft_mint

accounts.name: collection_mint
docs: Collection mint PDA

instructions.name: propose_authority_transfer
docs: Propose protocol authority transfer (step 1 of 2)

instructions.name: propose_unwind
docs: Propose to unwind the sovereign (Genesis NFT holders)

accounts.name: holder
docs: Proposal creator — must hold a deposit record with voting power

accounts.name: deposit_record
docs: Holder's deposit record — proves a valid deposit position with voting power

accounts.name: proposal
docs: Proposal account

instructions.name: realloc_protocol_state
docs: Realloc ProtocolState account to current layout size.
One-time migration after program upgrade adds new fields.
Protocol authority only.

accounts.name: protocol_state
docs: buffer may be too small for the current ProtocolState layout.

instructions.name: redeem_tokens_for_gor
docs: Token holders burn sovereign tokens for proportional surplus GOR.
Only available after governance unwind (Unwound state), within 30-day window.

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Source of GOR payout to token holders redeeming against the token_redemption_pool.
Funds flow only to `caller` after verified token transfer — no arbitrary withdrawal possible.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint — needed for transfer_checked (reads decimals)

accounts.name: caller_token_account
docs: Caller's token account — tokens will be transferred from here to creator

accounts.name: creator_token_account
docs: Creator's token account — receives the redeemed tokens instead of burning

instructions.name: renounce_protocol_authority
docs: Permanently renounce all protocol authority — IRREVERSIBLE.
Sets authority and pending_authority to Pubkey::default().
After this, all authority-gated instructions will reject any signer.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Current protocol authority — must sign to renounce.

instructions.name: renounce_sell_fee
docs: Permanently renounce sell fee control (sets to 0%, irreversible)
Only after recovery is complete (or anytime for FairLaunch mode)

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: The token mint with TransferFeeConfig

instructions.name: retire_sovereign
docs: Retire a sovereign after its 30-day claim window expires.
Permissionless crank — anyone can call.
Sovereign must be Failed, Halted, or Unwound with unwound_at + 30 days elapsed.

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can crank this — no authority check needed.

instructions.name: set_nft_mint_fee
docs: Set protocol-wide NFT mint fee and minimum backing.
Protocol authority only.

instructions.name: set_protocol_paused
docs: Pause/unpause protocol (emergency)

instructions.name: set_unwind_balance
docs: Set unwind_sol_balance from sol_vault balance (migration helper).
Protocol authority only. Sovereign must be Halted.
Enables emergency_withdraw to calculate proportional shares.

accounts.name: sol_vault
docs: Sovereign's SOL vault — read balance to set unwind_sol_balance

instructions.name: sweep_redemption_pool
docs: Sweep unclaimed redemption pool GOR to treasury after 30-day window expires.
Only callable by protocol authority.

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: Engine pool account (owned by engine program, writable for fee-snap CPI)

accounts.name: protocol_state
docs: Protocol state — needed to read default_swap_fee_bps on transition

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine-v3 program (needed for fee-snap CPI)

instructions.name: transfer_sovereign_control
docs: Permanently renounce the sovereign's mint authority (TokenLaunch only).
Protocol authority only. Callable in Active, Recovery, or Halted state.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority must sign.

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint — must match sovereign.token_mint.

instructions.name: update_engine_fees
docs: Update engine pool fee parameters (swap fee, creator share, bin fee share).
CPIs to sovereign_engine_v3::update_fees, sovereign PDA signs.
Protocol authority only (governance-gated).

accounts.name: caller
docs: Protocol authority — only admin can adjust engine fees

accounts.name: engine_pool
docs: Engine pool (owned by engine program)

accounts.name: engine_program
docs: The sovereign-engine-v3 program

instructions.name: update_protocol_fees
docs: Update protocol fee parameters

instructions.name: update_sell_fee
docs: Lower the sell fee (can only decrease, never increase)

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: The token mint with TransferFeeConfig

instructions.name: update_treasury
docs: Update protocol treasury address

instructions.name: vote
docs: Vote on an unwind proposal

accounts.name: holder
docs: Voter — must hold a deposit record with voting power

accounts.name: deposit_record
docs: Voter's deposit record — voting power from position_bps

accounts.name: vote_record
docs: Vote record — keyed by holder wallet to prevent double-voting

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw SOL during bonding phase (investors only)

instructions.name: withdraw_creator_failed
docs: Creator withdraws escrow from failed bonding

instructions.name: withdraw_failed
docs: Investor withdraws from failed bonding

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: Sovereign is not in the expected state

errors.name: InvalidAccountData
errors.msg: Invalid account data or discriminator mismatch

errors.name: DeadlinePassed
errors.msg: Bonding deadline has passed

errors.name: DeadlineNotPassed
errors.msg: Bonding deadline has not passed yet

errors.name: BondingNotComplete
errors.msg: Bonding target not yet met

errors.name: BondingComplete
errors.msg: Bonding target already met

errors.name: CreatorDepositExceedsMax
errors.msg: Creator deposit exceeds maximum allowed (1% of bond target)

errors.name: ZeroDeposit
errors.msg: Deposit amount is zero

errors.name: DepositTooSmall
errors.msg: Deposit amount below minimum (0.1 SOL)

errors.name: NoDepositRecord
errors.msg: No deposit record found

errors.name: ZeroWithdraw
errors.msg: Withdrawal amount is zero

errors.name: InsufficientDepositBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient deposit balance

errors.name: CreatorCannotWithdrawDuringBonding
errors.msg: Creator cannot withdraw during bonding phase

errors.name: InsufficientVaultBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient vault balance

errors.name: NothingToWithdraw
errors.msg: Nothing to withdraw

errors.name: CreatorMustUseCreatorWithdraw
errors.msg: Creator must use creator-specific withdraw instruction

errors.name: NFTAlreadyMinted
errors.msg: NFT has already been minted

errors.name: WrongNFT
errors.msg: Wrong NFT for this deposit record

errors.name: NFTNotMinted
errors.msg: NFT not yet minted

errors.name: NoGenesisNFT
errors.msg: No Genesis NFT - cannot participate in governance

errors.name: VotingPeriodNotEnded
errors.msg: Voting period has not ended yet

errors.name: VotingPeriodEnded
errors.msg: Voting period has ended

errors.name: VotingNotStarted
errors.msg: Discussion period has not ended — voting has not started yet

errors.name: ProposalNotActive
errors.msg: Proposal is not active

errors.name: NoVotingPower
errors.msg: No voting power

errors.name: ActiveProposalExists
errors.msg: Active proposal already exists

errors.name: ProposalNotFinalized
errors.msg: Proposal is not yet finalized — vote record cannot be closed

errors.name: ActivityCheckAlreadyPending
errors.msg: Activity check already pending

errors.name: NoActivityCheckPending
errors.msg: No activity check pending

errors.name: ActivityCheckPeriodNotElapsed
errors.msg: Activity check period has not elapsed

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Invalid mint - does not match sovereign's token_mint

errors.name: InvalidTreasury
errors.msg: Invalid treasury address - cannot be zero

errors.name: InvalidBondTarget
errors.msg: Invalid bond target - must be at least 50 SOL

errors.name: InvalidBondDuration
errors.msg: Invalid bond duration - must be 7-30 days

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount

errors.name: BondTargetMet
errors.msg: Bond target already met

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized

errors.name: FeeTooHigh
errors.msg: Fee too high

errors.name: SellFeeExceedsMax
errors.msg: Sell fee exceeds maximum (3%)

errors.name: FeeControlRenounced
errors.msg: Fee control has been renounced

errors.name: MissingTokenName
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Missing token name

errors.name: MissingTokenSymbol
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Missing token symbol

errors.name: MissingTokenSupply
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Missing token supply

errors.name: InvalidTokenName
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Invalid token name (1-32 chars)

errors.name: InvalidTokenSymbol
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Invalid token symbol (1-10 chars)

errors.name: InvalidTokenSupply
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Invalid token supply (must be > 0)

errors.name: InvalidMetadataUri
errors.msg: Token Launcher: Invalid metadata URI (1-200 chars)

errors.name: InvalidSovereignType
errors.msg: Invalid sovereign type for this operation

errors.name: TokenAlreadyCreated
errors.msg: Token has already been created for this sovereign

errors.name: MissingExistingMint
errors.msg: BYO Token: Missing existing mint address

errors.name: MissingDepositAmount
errors.msg: BYO Token: Missing deposit amount

errors.name: InsufficientTokenDeposit
errors.msg: BYO Token: Insufficient token deposit (below minimum % required)

errors.name: BYOMintAuthorityNotRenounced
errors.msg: BYO Token: Mint authority must be renounced (set to None) before creating a BYO sovereign

errors.name: BYOFreezeAuthorityNotRenounced
errors.msg: BYO Token: Freeze authority must be renounced (set to None) before creating a BYO sovereign

errors.name: BYOSupplyMismatch
errors.msg: BYO Token: Live mint supply does not match snapshot taken at create_sovereign — possible inflation or burn since creation

errors.name: VaultAmountMismatch
errors.msg: Token vault balance does not match expected deposit amount — possible external injection or token loss

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Already claimed

errors.name: NothingToClaim
errors.msg: Nothing to claim

errors.name: NotCreator
errors.msg: Caller is not the creator

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: PositionBpsExceedsMax
errors.msg: Position BPS exceeds 10 000 (100%)

errors.name: PositionNotActivated
errors.msg: Position not activated — call activate_position first

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero

errors.name: NoDeposits
errors.msg: No deposits in the sovereign

errors.name: PayoutTooSmall
errors.msg: Payout rounds to zero — increase token amount

errors.name: ProtocolPaused
errors.msg: Protocol is currently paused

errors.name: ActivityCheckCooldownNotElapsed
errors.msg: Activity check cooldown has not elapsed (7 days required)

errors.name: AlreadyHalted
errors.msg: Sovereign is already halted

errors.name: NoRedemptionPool
errors.msg: No surplus GOR available for token redemption

errors.name: NoCirculatingTokens
errors.msg: No circulating tokens to redeem against

errors.name: RedemptionWindowExpired
errors.msg: Token redemption window has expired

errors.name: RedemptionWindowNotExpired
errors.msg: Token redemption window has not expired yet

errors.name: InsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts provided

errors.name: NoPendingAuthorityTransfer
errors.msg: No pending authority transfer

errors.name: InvalidTokenProgram
errors.msg: Invalid token program - must be SPL Token or Token-2022

errors.name: SwapFeeOutOfRange
errors.msg: Swap fee must be between 100 and 300 bps (1% - 3%)

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Already initialized

errors.name: NftAlreadyListed
errors.msg: NFT is already listed for sale

errors.name: NftNotListed
errors.msg: NFT is not listed for sale

errors.name: ListingPriceTooLow
errors.msg: Listing price must be above minimum (0.01 SOL)

errors.name: BuyerIsSeller
errors.msg: Buyer cannot be the seller

errors.name: NotNftOwner
errors.msg: Caller does not own this NFT

errors.name: NftIsListed
errors.msg: NFT is currently listed — delist before burning

errors.name: InvalidNftBalance
errors.msg: NFT token account balance is not 1

errors.name: InsufficientPositionBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient deposit record balance for this mint

errors.name: NftBackingTooSmall
errors.msg: NFT backing amount below minimum

errors.name: VoteLockActive
errors.msg: Mint/burn/list blocked during active governance proposal

errors.name: NftMintFeeTooHigh
errors.msg: Mint fee exceeds maximum (25%)

errors.name: PositionBpsNotSet
errors.msg: Position BPS must be set before minting (call after bonding completes)

errors.name: NftPositionSovereignMismatch
errors.msg: NftPosition sovereign does not match

errors.name: SovereignMismatch
errors.msg: Sovereign account does not match the listing

errors.name: ListingNotExpired
errors.msg: Listing has not expired and sovereign is not in a terminal state

errors.name: ListingExpired
errors.msg: Listing has expired — cannot purchase

errors.name: SellFeeUpdateCooldownNotElapsed
errors.msg: Sell fee was updated too recently — 7-day cooldown required between updates

errors.name: MintAuthorityAlreadyRenounced
errors.msg: Mint authority has already been renounced for this sovereign

types.name: CreateSovereignParams
docs: Parameters for creating a new sovereign

fields.name: sovereign_type
docs: Type of launch (TokenLaunch or BYOToken)

fields.name: bond_target
docs: SOL to raise (in lamports)

fields.name: bond_duration
docs: Duration in seconds (7-30 days)

fields.name: name
docs: Sovereign name (for metadata)

fields.name: swap_fee_bps
docs: Swap fee in basis points (engine pool swap fee)

types.name: CreateTokenParams
docs: Parameters for creating a new token for a TokenLaunch sovereign

fields.name: name
docs: Token name for metadata

fields.name: symbol
docs: Token symbol for metadata

fields.name: uri
docs: Metadata URI (IPFS/Arweave)

types.name: CreatorFeeTracker
docs: Tracks creator's fee revenue and purchased tokens
Separate from DepositRecord because creator has different rules:
- Creator deposits TOKENS (not SOL to LP)
- Creator's SOL is escrowed for market buy
- Creator does NOT get Genesis NFT
- Creator does NOT get LP fee share

fields.name: sovereign
docs: The sovereign this tracker belongs to

fields.name: creator
docs: The creator's wallet address

fields.name: _pad_total_earned
docs: DEPRECATED — was total_earned, never written

fields.name: _pad_total_claimed
docs: DEPRECATED — was total_claimed, never written

fields.name: _pad_pending_withdrawal
docs: DEPRECATED — was pending_withdrawal, never populated

fields.name: _pad_threshold_renounced
docs: DEPRECATED — was threshold_renounced

fields.name: purchased_tokens
docs: Tokens purchased via market buy (from escrowed SOL)

fields.name: tokens_locked
docs: Whether purchased tokens are locked

fields.name: purchased_tokens_claimed
docs: Whether creator has claimed purchased tokens (after recovery)

fields.name: tokens_claimed
docs: Whether creator has claimed unwind tokens (LP tokens + purchased)

fields.name: _pad_sell_tax_accumulated
docs: DEPRECATED — was sell_tax_accumulated, never written

fields.name: _pad_sell_tax_claimed
docs: DEPRECATED — was sell_tax_claimed

fields.name: failed_reclaimed
docs: Whether creator has reclaimed on failed bonding

fields.name: purchased_at
docs: Timestamp when tokens were purchased

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: DepositRecord
docs: Tracks an investor's deposit in a sovereign
One DepositRecord per depositor per sovereign
NOTE: Creator does NOT have a DepositRecord (they use CreatorFeeTracker)

fields.name: sovereign
docs: The sovereign this deposit belongs to

fields.name: depositor
docs: The investor's wallet address

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount deposited in lamports

fields.name: position_bps
docs: Canonical position share in basis points (replaces shares_bps + voting_power_bps).
Set at NFT mint time; used for SOL-share, fee-share, and governance weight.

fields.name: genesis_nft_mint
docs: Genesis NFT mint address (set on finalization)

fields.name: _pad_fees_claimed
docs: DEPRECATED. Previously tracked depositor fee claims (vault was never funded).
Preserved as padding for account layout compatibility.

fields.name: _pad_nft_fields_a
docs: DEPRECATED: nft_mint (Option<Pubkey>) + _pad_voting_power_bps ([u8; 2]) + nft_minted (bool)
Removed — all NFT data is authoritative on the NftPosition PDA, not the DR.
33 + 2 + 1 = 36 bytes reclaimed as padding (split for Default trait).

fields.name: unwind_claimed
docs: Whether investor has claimed unwind distribution

fields.name: refund_claimed
docs: Whether investor has claimed failed bonding refund

fields.name: deposited_at
docs: Timestamp of initial deposit

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: FeeMode
docs: Fee distribution mode — DEPRECATED.
All sovereigns now use a single model: transfer fees always go to creator,
swap fees go to recovery until LPs are made whole.
Kept as enum for on-chain account layout compatibility.

types.name: NftListing
docs: Tracks an active NFT listing on the protocol marketplace.
One NftListing per NFT mint (PDA seeded by nft_mint).
Created by list_nft, closed by buy_nft or delist_nft.

fields.name: seller
docs: Seller's wallet address (current NFT holder)

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: The Genesis NFT mint being listed

fields.name: sovereign
docs: The sovereign this NFT belongs to

fields.name: price
docs: Asking price in lamports (SOL)

fields.name: listed_at
docs: Timestamp when listed

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Expiry timestamp (0 = no expiry; unix timestamp otherwise)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: NftPosition
docs: Tracks the backing value of a minted Genesis NFT.
One NftPosition per NFT mint (PDA seeded by nft_mint).
Created by mint_nft_from_position, closed by burn_nft_into_position.
The NftPosition is the source of truth for what an NFT represents.
It does NOT move when the NFT is transferred — the NFT is a freely
tradeable bearer token. To reclaim the backing, the holder burns
the NFT and the NftPosition is dissolved into their DepositRecord.

fields.name: sovereign
docs: The sovereign this NFT belongs to

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint this position backs

fields.name: amount
docs: SOL backing in lamports (post-fee: amount deposited minus mint fee)

fields.name: position_bps
docs: Voting power / claim share in basis points.
Carved from the original depositor's DepositRecord.position_bps.

fields.name: nft_number
docs: Sequential NFT number within this sovereign (for display: $overeign#42-001)

fields.name: minted_from
docs: Wallet that originally minted this NFT from their deposit record

fields.name: minted_at
docs: Timestamp when minted

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: Proposal
docs: Unwind proposal during Recovery phase
Only investors can create and vote (creator excluded)

fields.name: sovereign
docs: The sovereign this proposal belongs to

fields.name: proposal_id
docs: Unique proposal ID within the sovereign

fields.name: proposer
docs: Address that created the proposal

fields.name: status
docs: Current status

fields.name: votes_for_bps
docs: Total votes for (in basis points of total shares)

fields.name: votes_against_bps
docs: Total votes against (in basis points of total shares)

fields.name: total_voted_bps
docs: Total participation (in basis points of total shares)

fields.name: voter_count
docs: Number of unique voters

fields.name: quorum_bps
docs: Required quorum in basis points (default 6700 = 67%)

fields.name: pass_threshold_bps
docs: Required pass threshold in basis points (default 5100 = 51%)

fields.name: voting_ends_at
docs: Voting period end timestamp

fields.name: voting_starts_at
docs: Voting period start timestamp (after discussion/grace period)

fields.name: timelock_ends_at
docs: Timelock end timestamp (when execution is allowed)

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when proposal was created

fields.name: executed_at
docs: Timestamp when proposal was executed (0 if not executed)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: ProposalStatus
docs: Status of a governance proposal

types.name: ProtocolState
docs: Protocol-level configuration and statistics
Single PDA managing global settings for the Sovereign Liquidity Protocol

fields.name: authority
docs: Protocol admin - can update fees and settings

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury wallet receiving protocol fees

fields.name: creation_fee_bps
docs: Creation fee in basis points (0-1000 = 0-10% of bond target)
Default: 100 (1%)

fields.name: min_fee_lamports
docs: Minimum fee in lamports (non-refundable on failed bonding)
Default: 0.05 SOL (50_000_000 lamports)

fields.name: governance_unwind_fee_lamports
docs: Fee to create unwind proposal during recovery phase
Default: 0.05 SOL (50_000_000 lamports)

fields.name: unwind_fee_bps
docs: Fee taken from total WGOR during governance-driven unwind (0-2000 = 0-20%)
NOT applied during emergency unwind. Default: 2000 (20%)

fields.name: byo_min_supply_bps
docs: Minimum % of supply required for BYO Token launch
Default: 3000 (30%)

fields.name: min_bond_target
docs: Minimum bond target in lamports (50 SOL)

fields.name: min_deposit
docs: Minimum single deposit in lamports (0.1 SOL)

fields.name: auto_unwind_period
docs: Auto-unwind period in seconds (90-365 days)
Protocol-controlled for Active phase activity check

fields.name: min_fee_growth_threshold
docs: Minimum fee growth (Q64.64 delta) during 90-day observation period
to prove the sovereign is still viable and cancel the unwind.
Default: 1.25% of total_deposited annualized (5% APR / 4 quarters).
Adjustable by protocol authority.

fields.name: _pad_fee_threshold_renounced
docs: Padding: was fee_threshold_renounced (bool, 1 byte) — removed

fields.name: paused
docs: Emergency pause flag

fields.name: sovereign_count
docs: Total sovereigns created

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Lifetime protocol revenue in lamports

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: voting_period
docs: Voting period for governance proposals (in seconds)
Default: 7 days (604_800)

fields.name: observation_period
docs: Observation period after passed vote / activity check (in seconds)
Default: 90 days (7_776_000)

fields.name: governance_quorum_bps
docs: Quorum requirement for governance votes (in BPS)
Default: 6700 (67%)

fields.name: governance_pass_threshold_bps
docs: Pass threshold for governance votes (in BPS of votes cast)
Default: 5100 (51%)

fields.name: discussion_period
docs: Discussion/grace period before voting opens (in seconds)
Gives creators time to address concerns before votes can be cast.
Default: 3 days (259_200)

fields.name: _pad_keeper
docs: Reserved — was keeper field, now unused. Preserves on-chain layout.

fields.name: pending_authority
docs: Pending authority for two-step authority transfer

fields.name: default_swap_fee_bps
docs: Default swap fee applied to every sovereign's engine pool once
recovery completes (Recovery → Active).  Creators choose a
higher rate (1-3%) during recovery; this value replaces it.
Default: 30 bps (0.30%)

fields.name: collection_mint
docs: Collection NFT mint address — set once by initialize_collection.
Used by mint_genesis_nft to verify collection membership.

fields.name: creator_fee_share_bps
docs: Creator's share of LP swap fees in BPS (0–5000 = 0–50%).
Default: 2000 (20%). Remainder goes to bin LPs.
Adjustable by protocol authority via update_protocol_fees.

fields.name: nft_mint_fee_bps
docs: Fee charged when minting an NFT from a deposit record, in BPS (0–2500 = 0–25%).
Default: 500 (5%). The fee is paid in SOL by the minter to treasury.
Replaces per-sale royalties — fee is collected once at tokenization time.

fields.name: min_nft_backing
docs: Minimum SOL backing per minted NFT in lamports.
Default: 50_000_000 (0.05 SOL). Prevents dust NFT spam.
Adjustable by protocol authority.

fields.name: _pad_nft_royalty_wallet
docs: Padding: absorbs remaining 24 bytes from old `nft_royalty_wallet: Pubkey` (32 bytes)
which was replaced by `min_nft_backing: u64` (8 bytes). 32 - 8 = 24 bytes.
DO NOT REMOVE — required for on-chain account layout compatibility.

types.name: SovereignState
docs: Main sovereign state account - one per token launch

fields.name: sovereign_id
docs: Unique identifier for this sovereign

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator's wallet address

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint address (created or BYO)

fields.name: sovereign_type
docs: Type of launch (TokenLaunch or BYOToken)

fields.name: state
docs: Current lifecycle state

fields.name: name
docs: Sovereign name (max 32 bytes)

fields.name: token_name
docs: Token name (max 32 bytes)

fields.name: token_symbol
docs: Token symbol (max 10 bytes)

fields.name: metadata_uri
docs: Metadata URI (max 200 bytes)

fields.name: bond_target
docs: Required SOL to raise (in lamports)

fields.name: bond_deadline
docs: Unix timestamp deadline for bonding

fields.name: bond_duration
docs: Duration in seconds (for reference)

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Total SOL deposited by investors (excludes creator escrow)

fields.name: depositor_count
docs: Number of unique investor depositors

fields.name: creator_escrow
docs: Creator's escrowed SOL for market buy (max 1% of bond target)

fields.name: token_supply_deposited
docs: Tokens deposited by creator (100% for TokenLaunch, >=30% for BYO)

fields.name: token_total_supply
docs: Total supply of token (for BYO verification)

fields.name: sell_fee_bps
docs: Sell fee in basis points (0-300 = 0-3%)

fields.name: fee_mode
docs: Fee distribution mode — DEPRECATED (ignored by all instructions).
Preserved for account layout compatibility.

fields.name: fee_control_renounced
docs: If true, creator cannot change sell_fee_bps

fields.name: creation_fee_escrowed
docs: Amount held in creation fee escrow PDA

fields.name: _pad_amm_config
docs: Padding: was amm_config (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: swap_fee_bps
docs: Engine pool swap fee in basis points

fields.name: _pad_preset
docs: Padding: was preset_parameter (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_bin_step
docs: Padding: was bin_step (u16, 2 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_active_id
docs: Padding: was active_id_at_launch (i32, 4 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_lower_bin
docs: Padding: was lower_bin_id (i32, 4 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_upper_bin
docs: Padding: was upper_bin_id (i32, 4 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_position_base
docs: Padding: was position_base (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_pool_state
docs: Padding: was pool_state (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_lb_pair
docs: Padding: was lb_pair (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_position_mint
docs: Padding: was position_mint (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_position
docs: Padding: was position (Pubkey, 32 bytes)

fields.name: _pad_pool_restricted
docs: Padding: was pool_restricted (bool, 1 byte)

fields.name: recovery_target
docs: Target SOL to recover (equals total_deposited)

fields.name: total_sol_fees_distributed
docs: Total SOL fees distributed to investors

fields.name: _pad_token_fees
docs: Padding: was total_token_fees_distributed (u64, 8 bytes)

fields.name: recovery_complete
docs: Whether recovery phase is complete

fields.name: active_proposal_id
docs: Active proposal ID (0 if none)

fields.name: proposal_count
docs: Total proposals created

fields.name: has_active_proposal
docs: Whether there's an active proposal

fields.name: _pad_fee_threshold
docs: Padding: was fee_threshold_bps (u16, 2 bytes) — removed, never consumed

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Total fees collected (for tracking)

fields.name: total_recovered
docs: Total recovered during recovery phase

fields.name: _pad_total_supply
docs: Padding: was total_supply (u64, 8 bytes)

fields.name: genesis_nft_mint
docs: Genesis NFT collection mint

fields.name: unwound_at
docs: Timestamp when unwound (if applicable)

fields.name: last_activity
docs: Last activity timestamp

fields.name: activity_check_initiated
docs: Whether an unwind observation period is in progress

fields.name: activity_check_initiated_at
docs: Timestamp when unwind observation was initiated (Option for cleaner handling)

fields.name: activity_check_timestamp
docs: Timestamp when unwind observation period ends (90 days after vote passes)

fields.name: fee_growth_snapshot_a
docs: Snapshot of SAMM fee_growth_global_0_x64 at vote pass time
For DLMM: total_claimed_fee_x from position at snapshot time

fields.name: fee_growth_snapshot_b
docs: Snapshot of SAMM fee_growth_global_1_x64 at vote pass time
For DLMM: total_claimed_fee_y from position at snapshot time

fields.name: activity_check_last_cancelled
docs: Timestamp of last cancelled unwind observation (for cooldown)

fields.name: unwind_sol_balance
docs: SOL balance after removing liquidity (for claiming)

fields.name: unwind_token_balance
docs: Token balance after removing liquidity (for creator)

fields.name: token_redemption_pool
docs: Surplus GOR available for external token holder redemption
= max(0, unwind_sol_balance - total_deposited)

fields.name: circulating_tokens_at_unwind
docs: Snapshot of circulating tokens at time of LP removal
= mint.supply - token_vault.amount - lock_ata_tokens

fields.name: token_redemption_deadline
docs: Deadline for token holders to redeem surplus GOR (unix timestamp).
After this, unclaimed GOR is swept to treasury.

fields.name: last_activity_timestamp
docs: Last fee collection or activity timestamp

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when sovereign was created

fields.name: finalized_at
docs: Timestamp when finalized (LP created)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: _pad_creator_fee_wallet
docs: DEPRECATED. Previously stored the creator's fee destination wallet.
Preserved as padding for account layout compatibility.

fields.name: total_unwind_claimed
docs: Total GOR claimed by NFT holders via claim_unwind

fields.name: total_surplus_redeemed
docs: Total surplus GOR redeemed by token holders via redeem_tokens_for_gor

fields.name: creator_unwind_surplus
docs: BYO unwind: surplus GOR above investor principal, earmarked for creator.
Zero for TokenLaunch (surplus goes to token_redemption_pool instead).

fields.name: creator_unwind_claimed
docs: True after creator has claimed their unwind tokens and surplus GOR.
Prevents double-claim if token_vault receives tokens after claim.

fields.name: nft_counter
docs: Sequential counter for NFT numbering within this sovereign.
Incremented on each mint_nft_from_position call.

fields.name: mint_authority_renounced
docs: True after renounce_mint_authority (H-2) or transfer_sovereign_to_creator (H-1)
has been called.  Prevents double-renouncement.

fields.name: mint_authority_destination
docs: Destination of the mint authority after transfer_sovereign_to_creator.
Some(creator) if transferred to creator, Some(Pubkey::default()) if burned to None.
None if the authority has never been transferred.

fields.name: last_sell_fee_update
docs: Unix timestamp of the last successful update_sell_fee call.
0 means never updated — the first update is always allowed.

fields.name: byo_mint_authority_active
docs: Advisory: true if the BYO token's mint authority was active at creation.
Does NOT block launch — frontend shows a warning to depositors.

fields.name: byo_freeze_authority_active
docs: Advisory: true if the BYO token's freeze authority was active at creation.
Does NOT block launch — frontend shows a warning to depositors.

types.name: SovereignStatus
docs: Current state of the sovereign lifecycle

types.name: SovereignType
docs: Type of token launch

types.name: VoteRecord
docs: Individual vote record to prevent double voting

fields.name: proposal
docs: The proposal this vote belongs to

fields.name: voter
docs: The voter's wallet address

fields.name: genesis_nft_mint
docs: Genesis NFT used for voting

fields.name: voting_power_bps
docs: Voting power in basis points (from DepositRecord.shares_bps)

fields.name: vote_for
docs: Whether voted for (true) or against (false)

fields.name: voted_at
docs: Timestamp of vote

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed
